title: Offering to make amends
context: Ask how you can fix the problem you caused.

content.bestLine: How can I fix this for you?

neutral.text: What can I do to make it right?
How can I fix the problem?
What do you need from me to move forward?
Can I make it up to you somehow?
How can I make things better?
What's the best way for me to make amends?
Is there anything I can do to fix this?
Can I start by apologizing and making it right?

informal.text: My bad, how can I make it right?
What can I do to make you happy again?
How can I turn this around?
Can I buy you a drink to make up for it?
Let me make it up to you, okay?
What do you say I do to fix this?
I'm really sorry, can I make it right?
How about I try to make it better?

formal.text: I apologize, please let me know how I can rectify the situation.
What steps can I take to make amends?
How can I provide a solution to this problem?
I'd like to offer a solution, may I proceed?
Please accept my apology, and let me know how I can improve the situation.
What would you like me to do to resolve this issue?

patterns.template: How can I [options] to make it right?
What can I [options] to improve the situation?
patterns.meaning: Asking how to provide a solution

dialogs.description: Apologizing and offering to make amends in a neutral setting

lines.speaker: Person A
lines.text: I'm really sorry for what happened.

lines.speaker: Person B
lines.text: How can you make it right?

dialogs.description: Apologizing and offering to make amends in a formal setting

lines.speaker: Manager
lines.text: I apologize for the mistake, please let me know how I can rectify the situation.

lines.speaker: Client
lines.text: I appreciate your apology, please provide a solution to this problem.
